services.name: Professional Evening Makeup with Eyelash Extensions
services.description: Glamorous evening makeup with lash extensions for your special occasion.
services.fullDescription: Achieve a flawless finish with our antioxidant mineral makeup. Our talented makeup artist will enhance your natural beauty and transform you from glowing to glamorous look by adding Eyelash Extensions. Perfect for weddings, galas, photoshoots, and special celebrations.

services.name: Make-Up With Extension Eyelashes
services.description: Professional makeup application with stunning lash extensions for a complete transformation.
services.fullDescription: Book a professional makeup at Laura's Beauty Touch and bring out one of a kind beauty. Achieve a flawless finish with our antioxidant mineral makeup. Our talented makeup artist will enhance your natural beauty and transform you from glowing to glamorous.
